blogentry.blogheader: Moving over to our main domain
blogentry.blogcontents: You may have already noticed that instead of the plain old 'Whoops' page on our main domain, we have replaced it with the OpenSprites site. To make it easier for us to get things working, we need everything on the same web address; we've decided to start migrating the website from our developer domain to our main one. At the moment, we have not fully completed the migration, and some small issues may occur. Also, be aware that the main domain won't be updated as often as the developer domain, so you may experience problems. For this reason, please use the developer domain until we have completed this transition. Thanks! **cheeseeater**
